text: Blondie is an American new wave pop/rock band who were most popular in the 1970s and 1980s. The lead singer of the band is Debbie Harry. Their best-known hit was Call Me!. The group's music mixes pop, rock and disco. They were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame == Studio albums == * Blondie (1976) * Plastic Letters (1977) * Parallel Lines (1978) * Eat to the Beat (1979) * Autoamerican (1980) * The Hunter (1982) * No Exit (1999) * The Curse of Blondie (2003) * Panic of Girls (2011) * Ghosts of Download (2014) * Pollinator (2017) ==References== == External links == *Official Blondie Website *Official Deborah Harry Web Site Category:1974 establishments in the United States Category:1970s American music groups Category:1970s establishments in New York (state) Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American new wave bands Category:American pop rock bands Category:American punk bands Category:Musical groups established in 1974 Category:Musical groups from New York City Category:Pop punk bands
title: Blondie
